expected: ACTIVE
 but was: PENDING within 10 seconds.
Status expected:<400 BAD_REQUEST> but was:<404 NOT_FOUND>

Expecting actual:
  "HTTP/1.1 404 Not FoundHermes-Message-Id: d356ee47-def2-412a-90f3-fcb09a7fdb4aTransfer-Encoding: chunkedContent-Type: application/jsonDate: Fri, 04 Oct 2024 11:29:56 GMT"
to contain:
  "408 Request Time-out"

Expecting actual:
  "HTTP/1.1 404 Not FoundHermes-Message-Id: 21358688-be54-4012-a84d-0be0ab377cf9Transfer-Encoding: chunkedContent-Type: application/jsonDate: Fri, 04 Oct 2024 11:29:56 GMT"
to contain:
  "408 Request Time-out"
